en: Removes Plant Walls and Plant effects from a target. The user is healed a little based on the effects' duration.
Creates a wall for everyone on the battlefield that will absorb up to 3 hits for up to 3 turns.
Hits one target twice. Destroys Plant Walls, and removes Plant effects on contact. Lands critical hits on Plant-type targets.
Hits one target. On hit, creates a wall for the user that will absorb up to 2 hits for up to 2 turns.
Hits a whole team twice, removing Plant effects on contact. Does not cause reactions on Plant-type targets.
Gives a random target Healing Leaf for 2 turns, at the end of the turn.
